# isActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the page is currently active.

## Declaration

```swift
var isActive: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if active; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Getting the Safari Page Properties

- **title**: The title of the page.
- **url**: Indicates the URL of the page.
- **usesPrivateBrowsing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the page is using Safari Private Browsing.
